markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Astral](/Traits.aspx?ID=538)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 327 <sup>2.0</sup>

Astral creatures are natives of the Astral Plane. They can survive the basic environmental effects of the Astral Plane.
name: Astral
